sentences.en: Already he had begun to forget them, and Shepperton soon became an extraordinary aviary, filled with birds of every species.
sentences.cn: 他已经把那些邻居们给忘记了，谢伯顿不久就变成了一个特别的鸟类饲养场，拥有各类品种的鸟。

sentences.en: Aviary has many different kinds of birds.
sentences.cn: 百鸟居有很多不同种类的鸟.

sentences.en: I kept the birds indoors all winter and introduced them into an aviary the following June.
sentences.cn: 整个冬天我把鸟关在室内，然后在接下来的6月份把它们放入鸟类饲养场饲养。

sentences.en: Other recent structures dedicated to birds include a series of pavilions at an Australian sanctuary and an aviary at a Swiss park.
sentences.cn: 其他涉及鸟类生物的项目还包括澳大利亚保护区建造的一系列展馆和瑞士公园内的鸟类饲养场。

sentences.en: Parrot Aviary: Parrots bred here can be given to pirates, boosting their courage.
sentences.cn: 鹦鹉饲育园: 把这里喂养的鹦鹉给你的海盗船长, 能增加他们的勇气.

sentences.en: The birds will winter outside in an aviary.
sentences.cn: 鸟儿们将在外面的大鸟笼里过冬。

sentences.en: The owner said the bird may have escaped through a weak spot in the aviary.
sentences.cn: 鸟的主人说这只鸟可能是从鸟舍一处不结实的地方逃走的。

sentences.en: The Waterfall Aviary has the highest man - made waterfall in the world.
sentences.cn: 瀑布鸟舍拥有世界最高的人造瀑布.

sentences.en: There are many different kinds of birds in the aviary.
sentences.cn: 大鸟笼里有很多不同种类的鸟。

sentences.en: There was also an aviary full of rare birds.
sentences.cn: 那里面还有装满稀有鸟类的鸟舍.

trans.tran_cn: 大鸟笼，鸟舍，鸟类饲养场
trans.tran_en: a large  cage  where birds are kept
